actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act to provide an equitable distribution of land to the 13th Regional Corporation.

summary.text: Amends the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act to direct the 13th Regional Corporation to select 2,345,000 acres from public lands and provides for patent to the Corporation of the surface and subsurface estate of such lands.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act to provide an equitable distribution of land to the 13th Regional Corporation.
